description: It’s just sad because most ignorant people are just programmed to hate Trump because they think he’s racist. If you ask 90% of the people who hate Trump, they can’t even give you an answer on why they do. I was just at the barbershop and it was just full of a bunch of Trump haters but had no logic on the changes he’s bringing or why they even hated him. Watch the people in the comments come up with no legit reason why they dislike him. #hollyweirdisevil
